a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball II

p.k: The Knights / The Colossus / The Fridge / The Remote / The Flower / The Banana / The Phone / The Job The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isn't wise to upset Hector Elmore's resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Penny's affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons' battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwin's pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood.
